title: Move Finished Goods to Inventory
description: A pallet of finished goods has been produced and needs to be moved from the production line to the finished goods warehouse.

tasks.description: Identify the product and the quantity on the pallet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the product SKU and counts the number of cases on the pallet.

tasks.description: Generate a pallet license plate or tracking ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prints a unique barcode label for the pallet.

tasks.description: Perform an inventory transfer transaction from the production line location to a warehouse location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully transfers the pallet in the system, updating inventory records.
